name: semivowel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a speech sound that is produced like a vowel but that functions as a consonant: The words "yes" and "well" start with semivowels. Semivowels are glides like /w/ and /j/ that act as part of a diphthong.
More examplesFewer examplesEither the first or the second vowel will be treated as a semivowel.The combination of semivowel plus vowel e.g. [je] is a rising diphthong.A semivowel is a gliding sound in which the speech organs start at or near a close vowel and immediately move away to some other vowel.
